Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2009 06:47PM Avea wrote: I do have family history of breast cancer not sure if that's why they decided to do the US right then and there after the lump showed on the mammo.....I do know that I was shocked that they put me right in US not having any insurance and paying cash for the visit.....This wait feels forever Weds can not come quick enough for me only to wait longer to get the results.....But I am staying busy with my everyday life and staying positive knowing there is nothing I can do to change what will be will be.....Thinking of all of you and knowing how helpful you all are to me....
Posts.Title: Scared out of my mind! Avea Avea

Posts.Content: Aug 7, 2009 07:25PM Avea wrote: I thought this would be the easy part but waiting is by far the hardest....I am just so happy to have found women who have gone through and going through the same thing and that I am not alone......This site isÂ great! Thanks so much Tami
Posts.Title: Scared out of my mind! Avea Avea

Posts.Content: Aug 13, 2009 08:45AM Avea wrote: Went to surgeon to have biopsy he looked over everything and felt he wouldn't be able to get any fluid so now have to have a core ultrasound guided biopsy done waiting for the phone call to go.....So now back to waiting it out....Hope all of you are doing great and I am thinking of all of you as most of you have been where I am at this point.....
Posts.Title: Scared out of my mind! Avea Avea
Scared out of my mind! Avea Avea

Posts.Content: Avea wrote: I am 34 years old just had my first mammo done and thinking nothing of it they take me right into US......The doctor comes in looks and tells me right then and there i need a biopsy....I am scared to death....My report is BIRAD 4 go Aug 12th for biopsy......This site is amazing and I am so thankful to have found it.....
